Title: Speeding. Sentence 1: Eric hated taking the bus to school. Sentence 2: So he decided to learn how to drive. Sentence3: Within a month, he got his license. Sentence 4: But every morning, he sped to school. Choices: a. After his license was revoked, he had to take the bus again. Choices: b. The next morning I had a sore leg.
